title: Using whatthreewords
text: First, load package…

title: Using whatthreewords
text: what3words API requires key authentication. can register key https://developer.what3words.com/public-api. must set WTW_API_KEY environment variable hold key. example… now ready use package.

what: Get a what3words address from coordinates
title: Using whatthreewords
text: Use words_from_coords get what3words location given latitude longitude.

previous_headings: Get a what3words address from coordinates
title: Using whatthreewords
text: default, words_from_coords returns three words represent location. However, ’s possible return information location submitting full_details = TRUE.

previous_headings: Get a what3words address from coordinates
title: Using whatthreewords
text: words_from_coords vectorised coordinates can return multiple locations one call. example, take following data frame. can add what3words row like …
code: locations <- data.frame(name = c("Sheffield United", "Sheffield Wednesday", "Sheffield Club"),                          lat = c(53.3703, 53.41145, 53.3096),                          lon = c(-1.47119, -1.500204, -1.478715)) locations #>                  name      lat       lon #> 1    Sheffield United 53.37030 -1.471190 #> 2 Sheffield Wednesday 53.41145 -1.500204 #> 3      Sheffield Club 53.30960 -1.478715 locations$words <- words_from_coords(lat = locations$lat,                                       lon = locations$lon)  locations #>                  name      lat       lon             words #> 1    Sheffield United 53.37030 -1.471190 elite.icon.levels #> 2 Sheffield Wednesday 53.41145 -1.500204 weep.stands.shack #> 3      Sheffield Club 53.30960 -1.478715    soon.belt.owls

what: Get coordinates from a what3words location
title: Using whatthreewords
text: coords_from_words returns coordinates what3words location. default, coordinates returned matrix many rows length vector submitted words argument.
code: coords_from_words("hours.flesh.petal") #> Warning: ERROR: QuotaExceeded: Quota Exceeded. Please upgrade your usage plan, #> or contact support@what3words.com #>      lat lon #> [1,]  NA  NA

previous_headings: Get coordinates from a what3words location
title: Using whatthreewords
text: can also return full details location list.
code: coords_from_words("hours.flesh.petal", full_details = TRUE) #> $hours.flesh.petal #> $hours.flesh.petal$error #> $hours.flesh.petal$error$code #> [1] "QuotaExceeded" #>  #> $hours.flesh.petal$error$message #> [1] "Quota Exceeded. Please upgrade your usage plan, or contact support@what3words.com"

previous_headings: Get coordinates from a what3words location
title: Using whatthreewords
text: coords_from_words vectorised words. can return multiple coordinates like :
code: coords_from_words(c("laughs.remind.fact",                      "hotdog.jumping.frog",                      "dream.helps.forget")) #> Warning: ERROR: QuotaExceeded: Quota Exceeded. Please upgrade your usage plan, #> or contact support@what3words.com  #> Warning: ERROR: QuotaExceeded: Quota Exceeded. Please upgrade your usage plan, #> or contact support@what3words.com  #> Warning: ERROR: QuotaExceeded: Quota Exceeded. Please upgrade your usage plan, #> or contact support@what3words.com #>      lat lon #> [1,]  NA  NA #> [2,]  NA  NA #> [3,]  NA  NA

title: Using whatthreewords
text: what3words support range languages. can work different languages submitting supported ISO 639-1 two letter code language. Supported languages can determined get_available_languages.
code: words_from_coords(lat = 48.70913,                    lon = 9.001062,                    language = "de") #> [1] "entlang.erdkunde.richter" get_available_languages() |>    head() #>   nativeName code       name locales.nativeName locales.name locales.code #> 1    Deutsch   de     German               <NA>         <NA>         <NA> #> 2      हिन्दी   hi      Hindi               <NA>         <NA>         <NA> #> 3    ພາສາລາວ   lo        Lao               <NA>         <NA>         <NA> #> 4  Português   pt Portuguese               <NA>         <NA>         <NA> #> 5     Magyar   hu  Hungarian               <NA>         <NA>         <NA> #> 6 Українська   uk  Ukrainian               <NA>         <NA>         <NA> #>   locales.nativeName.1 locales.name.1 locales.code.1 #> 1                 <NA>           <NA>           <NA> #> 2                 <NA>           <NA>           <NA> #> 3                 <NA>           <NA>           <NA> #> 4                 <NA>           <NA>           <NA> #> 5                 <NA>           <NA>           <NA> #> 6                 <NA>           <NA>           <NA>

code: @Manual{,   title = {whatthreewords: Work with the 'what3words' API for Easy Location Referencing},   author = {David Smith},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.3},   url = {https://davidasmith.github.io/whatthreewords/}, }

what: Work with the what3words API for Easy Location Referencing
title: Work with the what3words API for Easy Location Referencing
text: whatthreewords package supports working what3words API R. what3words partitioned surface earth 3m x 3m squares, can identified three words. conventionally styled three slashes beginning. example, peak Great Pyramid Giza located three words ///ballots.height.silks. can use package determine three word address coordinates, return coordinates valid three word combination.

title: Work with the what3words API for Easy Location Referencing
text: can install development version whatthreewords GitHub :

title: Work with the what3words API for Easy Location Referencing
text: what3words API requires key authentication. can register key https://developer.what3words.com/public-api. must set WTW_API_KEY environment variable hold key. example…

title: Work with the what3words API for Easy Location Referencing
text: examples can package. details, see vignette ‘Using whatthreewords’.

what: Get a what3words address from coordinates
title: Work with the what3words API for Easy Location Referencing
text: Use words_from_coords get what3words location given latitude longitude. vectorised lat lon.
code: library(whatthreewords)  words_from_coords(lat = 51.5095,                    lon = -0.1266) #> [1] "lamp.inner.dent" words_from_coords(lat = c(53.3703, 53.41145, 53.3096),                    lon = c(-1.47119, -1.500204, -1.478715)) #> [1] "elite.icon.levels" "weep.stands.shack" "soon.belt.owls"

what: Get coordinates from a what3words location
title: Work with the what3words API for Easy Location Referencing
text: coords_from_words returns coordinates what3words location.
code: coords_from_words("hours.flesh.petal") #> Warning: ERROR: QuotaExceeded: Quota Exceeded. Please upgrade your usage plan, #> or contact support@what3words.com #>      lat lon #> [1,]  NA  NA

title: Work with the what3words API for Easy Location Referencing
text: alternative R client what3words available CRAN (Github repo). However, updated (time writing) several years couldn’t get work. needed something fairly quickly wrote scratch.

what: Returns the coordinates for a given what3words address — coords_from_words
title: Returns the coordinates for a given what3words address — coords_from_words
text: Returns coordinates given what3words address

title: Returns the coordinates for a given what3words address — coords_from_words
Returns the coordinates for a given what3words address — coords_from_words
text: words what3words location full_details FALSE (default) return coordinates. TRUE full details.

title: Returns the coordinates for a given what3words address — coords_from_words
text: full_details == FALSE (default) matrix WGS84 coordinates. Otherwise list full details what3words location.

title: Returns the coordinates for a given what3words address — coords_from_words
code: coords_from_words("hotdog.jumping.frog") #> Warning: ERROR: QuotaExceeded: Quota Exceeded. Please upgrade your usage plan, or contact support@what3words.com #>      lat lon #> [1,]  NA  NA

what: Get what3words address from coordinates — words_from_coords
title: Get what3words address from coordinates — words_from_coords
text: Get what3words address coordinates

title: Get what3words address from coordinates — words_from_coords
Get what3words address from coordinates — words_from_coords
text: lat Latitude lon Longitude language Code language returned words. full_details Whether return full details API, what3words address coordinates.

title: Get what3words address from coordinates — words_from_coords
text: full_details FALSE (default), returns character vector what3words submitted coordinates. Otherwise returns list full details returned API.

title: Get what3words address from coordinates — words_from_coords
